meanings.definition: A flooring material consisting of chips of marble or granite set in concrete and polished to give a smooth surface.
meanings.sent1: The terrazzo in the hallway sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: The terrazzo floor in the kitchen was easy to clean.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the terrazzo was a giant mosaic puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and polished as a terrazzo floor.
meanings.sent5: The terrazzo gleamed like a starry night sky.

meanings.definition: A type of flooring made by embedding small pieces of marble or granite in mortar and polishing the surface.
meanings.sent1: We chose terrazzo for its durability and elegance.
meanings.sent2: The terrazzo in the living room added a touch of luxury.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the terrazzo was a fancy scratching post.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a terrazzo of memories, each one shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The terrazzo floor felt cool and smooth under bare feet.
